entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is practicing the Stunning Spell.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is also helping him practice spells.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend, who is helping them with their spell practice.

entities.name: dobby
entities.description: A house-elf who is willing to help Harry with his spells.

entities.name: mrs. norris
entities.description: The person that Ron suggests they kidnap in order to practice the Stunning Spell on her.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are helping each other with their spell practice.
Harry and Hermione are also helping each other with their spell practice.
Ron suggests that Dobby could help Harry with his spells.
Harry is planning to practice the Stunning Spell on Mrs. Norris.
